--- In gladiator@y..., "mogdude33" <SGriese33@a...> wrote:
> Hey, i was playing around in my hex editor earlier, and I started 
> messing with the Gladiator save files. I'm going to go post a txt 
> file in the files section explaining what i did... cya.

Hmm, I would rather you not post a file explaining how to alter Save 
Game files.  If we are going to have a tournament, we need to be 
assured that Save Game files are not tampered with.  There is NO need 
to explore how to alter Save Game files (We already have a Gladiator 
File Checker - http://sluggy.net/glad/ - to look up which scenarios a 
team has been through.).
